meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, Auditorium L1FN and Videoconference, 1500 Marilla Street, Dallas, TX 75201

agenda_items.title: Call to Order
agenda_items.description: Opening of the meeting by the Board President.

agenda_items.title: Roll Call
agenda_items.description: Attendance check by the Assistant General Manager.

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of the minutes from the December 17, 2024, DPFC Board Meeting.

agenda_items.title: Ethics Disclosures
agenda_items.description: Disclosure of any relationships by DPFC Board members related to agenda items.

agenda_items.title: Fencing and Security Discussion
agenda_items.description: Discussion regarding fencing and security for 9999 Technology Blvd, Dallas TX.

agenda_items.title: Term Sheet Negotiation
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of a resolution authorizing negotiation and execution of a Term Sheet for The Humphreys.
agenda_items.presenter: Sam McDaniel, Trey Kostohryz, Summer Greathouse, Braxton Parsons

agenda_items.title: DPFC Annual Report
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of the DPFC Annual Report.

agenda_items.title: Board Officer Elections
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of DPFC Board officer elections.

agenda_items.title: Staff Hiring Committee Report
agenda_items.description: Monthly report of the DPFC Staff Hiring Committee.

agenda_items.title: Finance Committee Meeting Briefing
agenda_items.description: Discussion and briefing of the Finance Committee meeting.

agenda_items.title: Excess Funds Discussion
agenda_items.description: Discussion about the use of DPFC excess funds.

agenda_items.title: Property Monitoring Procedures
agenda_items.description: Briefing and discussion on DPFC-owned property monitoring procedures.

agenda_items.title: Website Briefing
agenda_items.description: Briefing and discussion on the DPFC website.

agenda_items.title: Pipeline Report Briefing
agenda_items.description: Briefing and discussion on the DPFC pipeline report.
